original: Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo hetu
ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke
Nasaraṇaṁ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca
saraṇo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
